column1:
Korn Ferry reported all-time financial performance highs in Q2 2021.
# 2. Revenue was up 47% and diluted and adjusted diluted earnings per share were $1.38 and $1.53, respectively.
# 3. Adjusted EBITDA margin was 21.1%.
# 4. Korn Ferry's performance over recent quarters has reached a new level of scale and agility, amid a time of enormous transition and secular change.
# 5. Korn Ferry's strategy in the New Year will be to continue to innovate, replicate, and scale, allowing people and organizations to exceed their potential in this rapidly changing world.
# 6. Korn Ferry's go-to-market strategy will focus on driving a top-down approach through its Marquee and Regional Accounts, which represent about 36% of its portfolio.
# 7. Cross referrals within the firm account for about 30% of Korn Ferry's revenue.
